Donation

Develop and write together.

We run today for great development

A small donation brings together a beautiful application.

We do our best to make a valuable open-source of AXISJ, not a free and low-quality one.
We are doing open-source projects and services from Javascript UI library 'AXISJ', responsive web application template package 'AXU', web icon font package 'AXIcon' and etc.
We are looking for someone who can help AXISJ. You can support through the following ways.

How to support

Bank transfer

Woori bank
1005-402-375399
AXISJ

Paypal

Purchase JSONGum

Only $4.99

You will be registered in our hero list with the information of your paypal account if you make a donation by paypal. If you prefer bank transfer, please let us know through email at tom@axisj.com or call +82-10-8881-9137 after making your transaction.

Support regularly

Paypal Reguarly

Join Github contributor

Go Github.com

Regular supporters(who donate annually or monthly) will be registered as our sponsor hero. gitHub contributors will be registered as Q&A hero or Bugging hero.
